title: Where could I find the grammar exercises for the ICSE 2018? - Quora

response.answer_text: Go for solving exercises from TOTAL ENGLISH BOOKS by XAVIER AND PAMELA PINTO. But learn the GRAMMAR BASICS ONLY FROM “WREN AND MARTIN”or if you have difficulty understanding it, consult your teachers that is why they are there for and ask them to help you out with the concept of TENSE, ACTIVE AND PASSIVE VOICE etc ALL THE BEST MAN!

Here are some links. An Approach to ICSE English: ICSE 2017 English Grammar Practice An Approach to ICSE English › 2017/01 › ics...
